data.title: User-Friendly Interface
data.desc: Simplify your schedule and stay organised with real-time updates on the display board, hearings, appointments, tasks, quick access to the calendar, easy navigation to the menu, and much more.

data.title: Stay Updated on Your Legal Cases
data.desc: Simplify case management by adding all of your cases from The Supreme Court of India, High Courts, District Courts, and Tribunals, combined on a single platform, under your Vakalat name or barcode.

data.title: Unlock the power of efficient legal research with our groundbreaking solution
data.desc: Expand your legal expertise with in-depth knowledge of Indian laws, acts, access to over 10,000+ court formats and work flow of courts across India.

data.title: Seamless Access to Legal Documents
data.desc: Enjoy a document vault with 10GB cloud storage, ensuring safe storage of case documents without the hassle of carrying them.

data.title: Efficient Property Due-Diligence with Automation
data.desc: Expedite your property due-diligence with automated procedures, generating reports within minutes.
